document_data.name: Luanna
document_data.mainbody: '''Luanna''' was a skilled blacksmith inhabiting the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the lateâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She was heavily muscled and had blonde hair worn in two long braids. Many [[dwarves]] thought she would be the perfect woman if she was just a few feet shorter.
document_data.Activities:
She owned [[Luanna's Forge]] which was located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] in between [[Center Street]] and [[Teshwave Street]].

Luanna had a reputation for crafting the best weapons and [[armor]] in the city.
document_data.Relationships: She did not get along well with her neighbor [[Balrud Thal]]. The pair tried to make the other's life as miserable as possible.
